name: CL_LEARN_ASSESS_QA
description: Enterprise reporting table for learning assessment questions per contact.

columns.name: LEARNING_ASSMT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the patient learning assessment record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line count for the patient learning assessment Questions.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The contact date in external format.

columns.name: TEMPLATE
columns.description: The template for the patient learning assessment contact.

columns.name: LA_QUESTION_ID
columns.description: Record ID for patient learning assessment question. Stored in internal ID format and links to LQL master file.

columns.name: LA_QUESTION_DAT
columns.description: Contact date for patient learning assessment question. Stored in internal format.

columns.name: LA_ANSWER
columns.description: Answer to the patient learning assessment question. Related to the learning assessment question ID.

columns.name: LA_COMMENT
columns.description: Comment to the learning assessment question. Related to the learning assessment question ID.

columns.name: QUESTION_USER_ID
columns.description: User ID of the person asking the learning assessment question. Related to the learning assessment question ID.

columns.name: QUESTION_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: QUESTION_INSTANT
columns.description: Date/Time stamp for the instance when the question was asked. Related to the learning assessment question ID.

columns.name: ADD_REPORT_YN
columns.description: Response to whether this learning assessment question should be added to the report or not.

columns.name: TEMPLATE_ID
columns.description: Record Id for the learning assessment template(ILA). Stored in internal format and links to ILA master file. Related to the learning assessment question ID.

columns.name: TOPIC_ID
columns.description: Record Id for the learning assessment topic(ILA). Stored in internal format and links to ILA master file. Related to the learning assessment question ID.

columns.name: END_CONT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of the last encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.
